item.title: Vim Skill
item.description: vim skill vimgrep is same as vim. search a string in current folder :vim /<pattern>/gj * search a string in current folder and all subfolder :vim /<pattern>/gj ** search a string in current folder and all subfolder only search in source file :vim /<pattern>/gj */**.c open file with line number vim +<line_number> <filename> remove space at the end of line %s/\s\+$//g 可以删除行尾多余的空格和tab符号。 %s/ *$//g /和*中间有空格，只能删除行尾空格，对于tab不能删除

item.title: Git Configuration
item.description: Because I am using nvim as git different tool, following configuration is required. [user] email = guangzong@pitt.edu name = Guangzong Chen [merge] tool = vimdiff [mergetool] keepBackup = false [mergetool "vimdiff"] cmd = nvim -d $LOCAL $REMOTE $MERGED -c '$wincmd w' -c 'wincmd J' [diff] tool = vimdiff [difftool] keepBackup = false [difftool "vimdiff"] cmd = nvim -d $LOCAL $REMOTE -c '$wincmd w'

item.title: Vim Configuration
item.description: install neovim install neovim and python-pynvim. Install python-pynvim in order to support python basic settings show line number set number show invisible number set list set listchars=tab:>- share system clipboard. in Archlinux package xclip is required set clipboard=unnamedplus convert tab to space set expandtab spell check set spell spelllang=en_us plug-in plug-in manager vim-plug I am using neovim, so following command used to install vim-plug. sh -c 'curl -fLo "${XDG_DATA_HOME:-$HOME/.local/share}"/nvim/site/autoload/plug.vim --create-dirs \ https://raw.

item.title: Vim Configuration
item.description: install neovim install neovim and python-pynvim. Install python-pynvim in order to support python vim-shortcut default collection and have the same dicimal keycode. Becareful.
